archimate:Requirement.name: TM.1.1.7b: b) determine the extent to which they are exposed to threats (e.g. checking whether powerful system utilities/commands have been disabled or weak passwords/passphrases are being used)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
